title: Johnson & Johnson' family-friendly image
text:
J&J's carefully crafted reputation may now be in jeopardy as the company fends off lawsuits connecting its products to cancer and fatal opioid addictions, according to brand expert Eric Schiffer. "We're seeing a pattern that's very concerning and causes them to fall into some of the stereotypes the public has about a greedy corporation,"
